- Tsunami: A giant wave comes moving in a specific direction, drowning players that are on the way.
- Sinkhole: The ground collapses, killing players in range and any players that enter this range in the future.
- Building Collapse: A building on the ship collapses, killing everyone inside it. Collapsed rooms cannot be entered in the future.</size>
ND_LimitMaximumDisastersAtOnce: Limit Maximum Active Disasters at Once
ND_VolcanoEruption.DurationAfterFlowComp: Time Before Despawning After Lava Flow is Complete
NDPlayerInfo: SURVIVE ALL NATURAL DISASTERS TO WIN
NDPlayerInfoLong: SURVIVE ALL NATURAL DISASTERS TO WIN
ModeDescribe.RoomRush:
In the Room Rush gamemode, everyone has to get to a specific room as fast as possible. The last player to get there dies. The last player alive wins!
Oh yeah, and there's also a time limit. Everyone who doesn't get to the room in the specified time dies. Seems easy, right? Well.... When the first 2 players enter the correct room, the time limit gets set to a lower amount, like a few seconds! Good luck!

You can see the room you have to get to below your name.
Depending on the settings, everyone may be able to vent limited times.
RR_GlobalTimeMultiplier: Global Time Multiplier (for adjusting the difficulty)
RR_TimeWhenTwoPlayersEntersRoom: When the first two players enter the correct room, the time limit is set to
RR_DisplayRoomName: Display the Name of the Room to Get to
RR_DisplayArrowToRoom: Display an Arrow to the Room to Get to
RR_DontKillLastPlayer: Don't Kill The Last Player to Enter the Correct Room
RR_DontLowerTimeLimitWhenTwoPlayersEnter: Don't Lower Time Limit When the First Two Players Enter the Correct Room
RR_DontKillPlayersOutsideRoomWhenTimeRun: Don't Kill Players Outside the Room When the Time Runs Out
RR_WinByPointsInsteadOfDeaths: Instead of deaths, count the places each time in points and the first player to get a certain amount of points wins
RR_Tutorial_Basics: The current game mode is <#ffab1b>Room Rush</color>.\n<size=90%>The goal is to get to the specified rooms as fast as possible.</size>
RR_Tutorial_RoomIndication_ArrowAndName: <size=90%>Both the name of the room and an arrow\npointing to it are displayed below your name.</size>
RR_Tutorial_RoomIndication_ArrowOnly: <size=90%>An arrow pointing to the room is displayed below your name.</size>
RR_Tutorial_RoomIndication_NameOnly: <size=90%>The name of the room is displayed below your name.</size>
RR_Tutorial_LowerTimeWhenTwoPlayersEnter: <size=90%>When 2 players enter the correct room,\nthe time limit is set to <#ffff44>{0}</color> seconds.</size>
RR_Tutorial_TimeLimitDeath: <size=90%>If you don't get to the correct room within the time limit, you die.</size>
RR_Tutorial_LastDeath: <size=90%>If you are last to get to the correct room, you die.</size>
RR_Tutorial_DontMoveOutOfRoom: <size=90%>After you get to the correct room, don't move out of it!</size>
RR_Tutorial_PointsSystem: <size=90%>When you get to the correct room, you get points.\nThe sooner you get there, the more points you get.</size>
RR_Tutorial_TimeLimitLastPoints: <size=90%>If you are last to or don't get to the correct\nroom within the time limit, you get teleported\nto a player who did and don't get any points.</size>
RR_Tutorial_PointsToWin: <size=90%>The first player to reach <#ffff44>{0}</color> points wins.</size>
RR_YouWereLast: <#ff1919>You were the last to get to the room</color>
RR_Tie: <size=80%><#00a5ff>In tie with {0}\nWaiting for the tie to break....</color></size>
ModeDescribe.KingOfTheZones:
In the King Of The Zones gamemode, players are split into teams. Some rooms on the map represent a zone. If a team has more players in a room than all other teams, they control the zone. Every second, each team gets 1 point for each zone controlled. Gain as many points as possible, since the team with the highest score wins!

Players can tag others using the kill button. Tagged players are teleported outside of the map for a few seconds, then teleport back.

Depending on the settings, zones may move during the game. If so, this will be indicated by a timer. When a zone moves, it may have a downtime. This is the case if the timer is gray.
KingOfTheZones.AutoSetNumTeams: Set the Number of Teams Automatically based on the Player Count  (If the below setting doesn't produce even teams)
KingOfTheZones.AllZonesMoveAtOnce: All Zones Move At Once  (if disabled, there will be an equal gap between zone movements)
KingOfTheZones.DowntimeAfterZoneMove: Downtime After Zone Move  (during downtime, the zone stays neutral)
KingOfTheZones.GameEndsByPoints: Game Ends If a Team Gets to a Certain Amount of Points
KingOfTheZones.GameEndsByTimeLimit: Game Ends After a Certain Time
KOTZ.Notify.ShortIntro:
Welcome to another game of <#ff0000>King Of The Zones</color>!
<size=90%><#ffff44>{0}</color> teams, <#ffff44>{1}</color> zones.
Tag cooldown: <#ffff44>{2}</color>s, Respawn time: <#ffff44>{3}</color>s.</size>
Good luck and have fun!
KOTZ.Notify.Tutorial.Basics:
We're playing <#ff0000>King Of The Zones</color>.
<size=90%>Players are split into <#ffff44>{0}</color> teams.
<#ffff44>{1}</color> rooms on the map represent a zone.
Teams must have majority (by player count) in a zone to control it,
which is awarded by 1 point for each zone every second.</size>
KOTZ.Notify.Tutorial.GameEnd.PointsOnly: <size=90%>When a team reaches <#ffff44>{0}</color> points, the game ends and they win.\n<size=70%>Upon a tie, the game ends when the tie breaks.</size></size>
KOTZ.Notify.Tutorial.GameEnd.TimeOnly: <size=90%>After <#ffff44>{0} minutes and {1} seconds</color>, the team with the most points wins.\n<size=70%>Upon a tie, the game ends when the tie breaks.</size></size>
KOTZ.Notify.Tutorial.GameEnd.PointsOrTim: <size=90%>The game ends if a team reaches <#ffff44>{0}</color> points or after <#ffff44>{1}m {2}s</color>.\nWhen there's no tie, the team with the most points wins.</size>
KOTZ.Notify.Tutorial.Tagging: <size=90%>Players can tag others using the kill button (cooldown: <#ffff44>{0}</color>s),\nwhich teleports them outside the map for <#ffff44>{1}</color>s.</size>
KOTZ.Notify.Tutorial.ZonesMoving.AllAtOn: <size=90%>Every <#ffff44>{0}</color>s, all zones move to a different room.\n(Indicated by timers next to the room names.)</size>
KOTZ.Notify.Tutorial.ZonesMoving.Separat: <size=90%>Every <#ffff44>{0}</color>s, a zone moves to a different room.\n(Indicated by timers next to the room names.)</size>
KOTZ.Notify.Tutorial.ZonesMoving.Downtim: <size=90%>After a zone has moved, it stays neutral for <#ffff44>{0}</color>s,\nmeaning no teams can have majority in it.\n(Indicated by a gray timer.)</size>
KOTZ.Suffix.Tie: Tie: {0}\nWaiting for the tie to break....
ModeDescribe.TheMindGame:
The Mind Game is a 4-round elimination game focused on strategy, bluffing, and item use. Players compete for points across rounds, with only one emerging victorious.
Round 1: Demand Points - Pick a number. If someone else picks the same, both get nothing. Reach the point goal first to advance. Lowest scorers in each group are eliminated.
Round 2: Super Point Auctions - Bid normal points in hidden auctions for super points. Highest bidders win. Lowest super point holders are eliminated.
Round 2.5: Merchant Intermission - Spend super points on powerful items. Items can blind, block, steal, or enhance. Use commands to buy and activate them.
Round 3: Demand + Items - Same as Round 1, but items are active. Everyone plays together. Lowest scorers are eliminated until only a few remain.
Round 4: The Briefcase Game - One player holds the winning briefcase. Get ejected while holding it to lock in placement. Briefcases shuffle after each ejection. If only 2 remain, the briefcase holder loses. Use Lasso to steal.
Final Scoring: Total score = points from rounds + super points bonus + placement bonus. Highest total wins.
TMG.Setting.TimeForEachPickInRound1: Time for Each Pick in Round 1
TMG.Setting.NumPointsToAdvanceInRound1: Number of Points to Advance in Round 1
TMG.Setting.SuperPointsToNormalPointsMul: Super Points to Normal Points Multiplier
TMG.Setting.TimeForEachPickInRound2: Time for Each Pick in Round 2
TMG.Setting.TimeForItemPurchasingInRound: Time for Item Purchasing in Round 2
TMG.Setting.TimeForEachPickInRound3: Time for Each Pick in Round 3
TMG.Tutorial.Basics: The Mind Game has 4 rounds.\nEach round's goal will be explained as it begins.\nGet as many points as possible - highest score wins!
TMG.Tutorial.Round1:
Pick a number 1-3 by clicking the Vanish button
Your number appears below your name and cycles with each click.
You have {0} seconds to lock in your choice.
This is how many points you demand.
If another player picks the same number, <u>neither</u> of you get points.
The round repeats until someone reaches {1} points.
The {2} lowest scorers are eliminated.
TMG.Tutorial.Round2:
3 hidden-bid auctions are held for super points.
Bid using your normal points with the Vanish button (same as Round 1).
Highest bidder(s) win(s) the super points, others still lose their bid.
Super points are used to buy items in the next round and count toward your final score (1 super point = {0} normal points).
After all auctions, players with the lowest super points are eliminated.
TMG.Notify.SamePick: <#ff5555>{1} has also picked {0}!\n<size=80%>Neither of you get points.</size></color>
TMG.Notify.AuctionEnd: The highest bid was {0} by {1}!\n<size=80%>They won {2} super points!</size>
TMG.Notify.ItemPurchasingBegins: Now you have {0}s to buy items with your super points!\nPress Vanish to signal that you're done.\nThe items can be used right away!
TMG.Notify.ItemPurchasingEnd: The item purchasing phase is over!\n<size=80%>The remaining super points will contribute to your final score.</size>
TMG.Tutorial.Round3:
Same rules as Round 1, but now you can use your items.
No groups, everyone plays together.
Pick a number from 1 to {0} using the Vanish button.
Lowest scorers are eliminated until only {1} players remain for Round 4.
TMG.Tutorial.Round4:
One player gets the winning briefcase, others get empty ones.
Goal: Get ejected while holding the winning briefcase!

If ejected with the winning briefcase: you lock in your placement.
If ejected with an empty one: you're ranked from the bottom.

After each ejection, a meeting is triggered and the briefcase is shuffled.
When only 2 players remain, the one holding the winning briefcase automatically loses.

Briefcases can be stolen using Lasso.
If yours is stolen, you'll be notified.
Use `s {id}` to guess who took it and try to steal it back.
TMG.Notify.Round4EndLastHolder: {0} would receive the last winning briefcase
TMG.Notify.Round4End: The final round has ended.\nLet's see the ranking of the players from Round 4!
TMG.Notify.Round4PointGain: Let's convert the places to points!\n\n{0}
TMG.Notify.SuperPointConversion: Your super points have been converted to normal points.\n1 super point is worth {0} normal points.

TMG.Message.ItemPurchased: You bought {0} for {1} super points!\nYou have {2} super points left.
TMG.Message.CannotPurchase: Someone used the Merchant-Dise on you!\nYou cannot buy items.

TMG.Message.YouHoldTheWinningBriefcase: <#00ff00>You hold the winning briefcase!</color>\n<size=80%>Get ejected to lock in your placement.\n<#ffff00>Be careful, briefcases can be stolen!</color></size>
TMG.Message.YouHoldAnEmptyBriefcase: You hold an empty briefcase.\n<size=80%>Don't get ejected.\nIf you have Lasso, you can steal someone's briefcase.</size>
TMG.Message.StealBackNotLastHolder: You are not the previous holder of the briefcase, or you were the one who stole it!\nYou cannot steal it back.

TMG.Suffix.BuyItemHint: To buy an item, type 'b' and then the item's ID. For example, 'b0' buys the first item.
TMG.Suffix.UseItemHint: <size=80%>To use an item, type 'u', then the item's ID,\nthen the player's ID who you want to use it on, separated by a space (if it's not used on yourself).\nFor example, 'u0 3' uses the first item, on the player who has the '3' ID.</size>

TMG.ItemDescription.Lasso: Used in Round 4 to steal a player's briefcase.

TMG.ItemDescription.Fool: Instantly causes a target player to lose {0} normal points.
TMG.ItemDescription.MindDetective: Reveals the target's point demand. Has a chance to be inaccurate.
TMGPlayerInfo: THINK WITH OTHERS' BRAINS TO WIN
TMGPlayerInfoLong: THINK WITH OTHERS' BRAINS TO WIN
ModeDescribe.BedWars:
In the Bed Wars gamemode, players are split into teams. Each team has a bed. If a team's bed is destroyed, all players in that team can no longer respawn. The goal is to destroy all other teams' beds (via Pet button) and be the last team alive.

You can buy items (blocks, weapons, tool, etc.) and team upgrades (heal pool, haste, trap, etc.) in shops from the resources (iron, gold, diamond, emerald) you can collect from the generators on the map. These are useful for protecting the bed with various layers to make it harder to break it, increase your attack damage, increase your defense, or give you or your team various abilities.

In the beginning, there's a grace period, where no attacks are allowed, and players can't leave their own base.

Each player has an inventory with all of their items. Cycle through the slots using the Vanish button or by typing the number of the slot in the chat (ex. '5'). Use weapons through the kill button, other items via Pet. To start breaking someone's bed, Pet. Make sure to always have the correct item selected in your inventory (blocks when you protect the bed, tools when you break beds, etc.).
You can break beds with anything, but using the correct tool for each layer will make the process significantly faster.

If you die, you will respawn after a few seconds, unless your bed is broken. If your bed is broken, you will not respawn anymore.

BedWars.UpgradeDescription.ReinforcedArm: Team members with armor take even less damage from attacks.
BedWars.UpgradeDescription.Sharpness: Team members with swords deal more damage with their attacks.
BedWars.UpgradeDescription.Forge: The team's iron and gold generator doubles resource production.
BedWars.UpgradeDescription.Trap: Alerts the team when an enemy enters the base and slows/blinds the enemy.
BedWars.UpgradeDescription.HealPool: The team regenerates more health in the base.
BedWars.ItemDescription.Wool: Easily breakable block, especially with shears.
BedWars.ItemDescription.EndStone: Hard to break, unless you have a pickaxe.
BedWars.ItemDescription.Wood: Semi-hard to break, unless you have an axe.
BedWars.ItemDescription.Glass: Very easy to break, but TNTs cannot destroy it.
BedWars.ItemDescription.Obsidian: Nearly impossible to break without a pickaxe.
BedWars.ItemDescription.IronArmor: Lessens the damage you take from attacks.
BedWars.ItemDescription.DiamondArmor: Significantly lessens the damage you take from attacks.
BedWars.ItemDescription.Pickaxe: Used to break End Stone and Obsidian significantly faster.
BedWars.ItemDescription.Axe: Used to break Wood significantly faster.
BedWars.ItemDescription.GoldenApple: Sets your health to full instantly after using it.
BedWars.ItemDescription.TNT: Time bomb that damages all players and blocks in a radius.
BedWars.ItemDescription.InvisibilityPoti: Makes you temporarily invisible to all other players.
Bedwars.BedStatus.ProtectReq: of block needed for next protection layer
BedWars.ShopAndItemGeneratorRangeOption: Shop and Item Generators' Pickup Range
ModeDescribe.Deathrace: In the Deathrace gamemode, there is a specific track you need to follow on the map, repeatedly. If you enter a room that isn't the next one on the track, you die! You must complete all laps first to win.\n\nSome power-ups are available next to the track, go near them to pick them up. It will tell you what they do and how to use them when you pick them up. You can store multiple power-ups and use them one at a time.

ModeDescribe.Mingle: In the Mingle gamemode, the game assigns a certain number of players to certain rooms on the map. At the end of the time limit, exactly that number of players need to be in the rooms. If there are too many or too few players in a room, all players in that room die. If you are not in any of the assigned rooms, you die. Oh, and if no one dies in a round, the time limit permanently decreases. The last player alive wins!
Mingle.Tutorial:
The current game mode is <#FE9900>Mingle</color>.
<size=90%>The game assigns a certain number of players to certain rooms on the map.
At the end of the time limit, exactly those numbers of players need to be in the rooms.
If there are too many or too few players in a room, all players in that room die.
If you are not in any of the assigned rooms, you die.
Oh, and if no one dies in a round, the time limit permanently decreases.
The last player alive wins!</size>

ModeDescribe.Snowdown:
In the Snowdown gamemode, the player that successfully throws the most snowballs at other players wins! You get 1 coin for every hit. You can spend coins on powerups in the shop, or turn pet to turn 20 coins into 1 point. Highest <u>points</u> (not coins) wins! Triggers:
- Vanish: Throw a snowball in your movement direction / Cycle between powerups while in shop
- Calling a ciritical Sabotage: Enter/Exit shop
- Pet: Turn 20 coins into 1 point / Buy selected powerup in shop
- Kill: Give the target one of your snowballs

Snowdown.ShopHelp: Vanish: Cycle between powerups | Pet: Buy selected powerup | Sabotage: Exit shop
ModeDescribe.Quiz: In the Quiz game mode, you must answer questions correctly to survive. There are various difficulties with varying time limits. Each question has 5 answer choices: A, B, C, D, E. Each choice has a room name next to the answer. To pick an answer, you must enter the room corresponding to the answer. If you answer correctly, you survive. If you don't answer enough questions correctly, you eventually die or compete in a Free For All (FFA) match with the other players who got the questions wrong.

DoingTasksIsPointlessInThisGameMode: Look, I see that you're a very diligent crewmate, but....\nDoing tasks is completely pointless in this game mode
ModeDescribe.HideAndSeek:
In the Hide And Seek gamemode, seekers have to kill all hiders, while hiders have to complete all tasks without being killed in order to win.
If the time limit reaches 0, hiders win.
If everyone apart from the Seekers die, the Seekers win.

Roles: Hider, Seeker, Fox, Troll, Jumper, Detector, Jet, Dasher, Locator, Venter, Agent, Taskinator
TimeDecreaseOnShortTaskComplete: When Completing a Short Task, Reduce the Game Time by
TimeDecreaseOnCommonTaskComplete: When Completing a Common Task, Reduce the Game Time by
TimeDecreaseOnLongTaskComplete: When Completing a Long Task, Reduce the Game Time by
TimeDecreaseOnSituationalTaskComplete: When Completing a Situational Task, Reduce the Game Time by
TimeDecreaseOnOtherTaskComplete: When Completing a Task That Doesn't Fit Any Category, Reduce the Game Time by

HiderInfoLong: Complete tasks and survive until the end
FoxInfo: Survive until the end to win

GooseInfo: Trabnij na graczy, by ich denerwowac
GooseInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nako Goose mozesz trabic na graczy, by ich denerwowac. Mozesz ich przeciagac i uniemozliwic im uzywanie zdolnosci, dopoki na nich trabisz.
SimonInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs Simon, you can give instructions to players (Simon Says). Single click on someone to mark them, double click to kill to kill them. Vent to give out an instruction to all marked players. Players with kill buttons will be told to kill, while crewmates will be told to complete a task. If they don't follow the instruction until the next meeting, they will die. You can sabotage/pet to swap the instruction. This means, those who can, will be told to NOT kill, while crewmates will be told to NOT complete a task.
SimonKill: Simon says: <#ffff00>You must use your kill button before the next meeting</color>
SimonTask: Simon says: <#ffff00>You must complete a task before the next meeting</color>
SimonDontKill: Simon says: <#ffff00>You must NOT use your kill button until the next meeting</color>
SimonDontTask: Simon says: <#ffff00>You must NOT complete a task until the next meeting</color>
CatcherInfoLong:
(Crewmates):\nJako Catcher mozesz rozstawiac pulapki wchodzac do ventu lub glaszczac peta. Gdy gracz wejdzie w pulapke, jego rola zostanie zapisana. Na kolejnym spotkaniu otrzymasz liste zlapanych rol.<size=80%>

Uwaga: Nie wiesz, kto wszedl w pulapke ani kto ma jaka role. Mozesz rozstawic wiele pulapek i otrzymasz liste wszystkich rol zlapanych we wszystkich pulapkach.</size>
Catcher.TrapPlaceDelay: Opoznienie rozstawienia pulapki (po wejciu do ventu) (jesli nie uzywasz glaskania)
Catcher.MinPlayersTrappedToShowInfo: Minimum Number of Players Trapped to Show Info
Catcher.NotEnoughCaughtRoles: Zbyt malo graczy weszlo w Twoje pulapki, by pokazac role.
GeneratorInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Generator, you generate charges every second. You can only kill/vent/shapeshift/sabotage if you have enough charges to do so. You also lose charges while shapeshifted.
Generator.ChargesLostWhileShiftedPerSeco: Charges Lost While Shifted Per Second
Generator.Notify.RevertShapeshift: You ran out of charges, so shapeshifting was reverted
Generator.Notify.NotEnoughCharges: You don't have enough charges ({0}) to do that
GNoCommandInfo: This Command can only be used when in lobby or after you die. type /gno X to play guess a number. X can be a number between 0 and 99 (both included). You get maximum of 7 tries to guess the number. Example:- /gno 10
GNoLost: Oh, you were so close! Just one more guess, and you might have deciphered the Da Vinci code! By the way, <color=#ff0000>the secret number was... {0}!</color> But hey, you were only off by a few billion possibilities.  Better luck next time, Sherlock!
GNoLow: Oh, you're really nailing this! It's so low, I almost need a shovel to dig it up!\nYou have <color=#ff0000>{0} guesses</color> left!
GNoHigh: Oh, absolutely! You're getting warmer. In fact, it's so high, I need a telescope to see it from here! \nYou have <color=#ff0000>{0} guesses</color> left!
GNoWon: Oh, how did you ever figure that out? It's almost like you're a mind reader! Congratulations, you're a genius! You found the secret number with <color=#00ff00>{0} guesses</color> left!
BanditInfoLong:
(Neutral):
Kliknij kill raz, aby ukrasc add-on (o ile jest to mozliwe). Kliknij dwa razy, aby zabic.

Zabij wszystkich, aby wygrac!
Uwagi:
- Gdy juz nie bedziesz mogl krac, przycisk kill bedzie zabijal przy jednokrotnym kliknieciu.
- Moze byc wlaczone przekazywanie add-onow tylko w czasie meetingu.
DoorjammerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Doorjammer, you can pet in a room to jam it. No one will be able to close the doors in that room, and may not even be able to call any sabotages from that room.
Doorjammer.BlockSabotagesFromJammedRooms: Block All Sabotages From Jammed Rooms
DoorjammerBlockSabo: <#bb0000>This room is jammed, you can't sabotage in here</color>
NegotiatorInfoLong: (Crewmates): Jako Negotiator możesz negocjoważ z graczem, głosujac na niego podczas spotkania. Twój cel musi wybrać jedno z następujących: samobójstwo, otrzymanie szkodliwego dodatku, trwale obniżona widoczność lub prędkosc. Jeśli nic nie wybierze, domyślna kara to samobojstwo. Może użyć /neg {index}, by dokonać wyboru. Możesz negocjować tylko raz na spotkanie. Po spotkaniu dowiesz się, co wybral cel.
Negotiator.MinVotingTimeLeftToNegotiate: Minimalny czas glosowania wymagany do negocjacji
Negotiator.TargetMessage: Negotiator zmusil Cie do wybrania jednej z ponizszych opcji (uzyj /neg {numer}, podstawiajac numer opcji, np. /neg 1), inaczej zginiesz:\n
Negotiator.Title: <#ffff00>⚠ Negotiator ⚠</color>
CommanderInfoLong: (Impostors): As the Commander, you can switch between 6 modes by venting/petting. You can execute the selected action by shapeshifting. Mark: Marks your shapeshift target with a unique color visible to all impostors. Use this to command them to kill that player! Whistle: This tells all or 1 specific* impostor(s) to come to you and gives them (each) an arrow pointing towards you. Kill Anyone: Notifies all or 1 specific* impostor(s) to kill anyone. Leave Player Alive: Shapeshifting into a crewmate marks that player with a unique color and text telling other impostors to not kill that player. Shapeshifting into an impostor tells that impostor to not kill anyone. Don't Sabotage: Notifies all impostors to not call any sabotage. Use Ability: Notifies all or 1 specific* impostor(s) to use their ability. * If you shapeshift into an impostor, the action executes specifically and only on them.
CommanderNotify: The Commander wants you to meet with them
CommanderKillAnyoneNotify: Commander wants you to kill anyone
CommanderDontSabotageNotify: Commander wants you to not sabotage
CommanderUseAbilityNotify: Commander wants you to use your ability
CommanderDontKillAnyoneNotify: Commander wants you to not kill
CommanderDontKillMarkMode: Mark a Player to Leave Alive
CanOnlyUseWhileAnyWatch: Can Only Use Ability When There is a Device Usage Alert
AAWarning: <#ffff00>You must move away from this device or you die!</color>
AnchorInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYou cannot be assigned any ghost roles.
BlockedInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYou cannot move between vents. You can still enter and exit the same vent.
RoomRusherInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nYou're playing Room Rush. You have to get to the specified room as fast as possible, but always within the time limit, otherwise you die. You may be able to vent limited times depending on the host's settings. After you get to the specified room a certain amount of times successfully without dying, your win condition satisfies and you'll win with the winning team at the end.
RoomRusher.RoomsToWin: Number of rooms to get to for the win condition to satisfy
WizardInfoLong: (Crewmates): As the Wizard, you have 3 stats you can change for each player: Speed, Vision, and Kill Cooldown. Pet to cycle between these stats. Press Vanish to increase the value of the stat. To give the selected stat with its value to a player, use your kill button on them. Think twice before applying an effect, as it is permanent! You can override it by applying the same effect on them with a different value, but that removes another ability use!
Wizard.MinSpeedValue: Maximum Speed that can be given to players
Wizard.MinVisionValue: Maximum Vision that can be given to players
Wizard.MinKCDValue: Minimum Kill Cooldown that can be given to players
Wizard.MaxSpeedValue: Minimum Speed that can be given to players
Wizard.MaxVisionValue: Minimum Vision that can be given to players
Wizard.MaxKCDValue: Maximum Kill Cooldown that can be given to players
Wizard.SpeedStep: Step in which Speed is increased
Wizard.VisionStep: Step in which Vision is increased
Wizard.KCDStep: Step in which Kill Cooldown is increased
OxymanInfo: Twoj poziom tlenu zmienia twoje cechy
OxymanInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nJako Oxyman masz pasek tlenu pod nickiem. Poziom tlenu stopniowo spada. Musisz wentowac, aby go podniesc. Jesli poziom tlenu osiagnie 0% to umrzesz. Jesli bedzie bardzo niski oslepniesz. Jesli niski to bedziesz spowolniony. Jesli wysoki to bedziesz szybszy. Jesli bardzo wysoki to bedziesz nietykalny.
Oxyman.IncrementByVenting: On Venting, Oxygen Level Increases by
Oxyman.DecreasementEachSecond: Every Second, Oxygen Level Decreases by
BeehiveInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Beehive, you can sting players by single clicking your kill button on them. Stung players will have a certain time to walk a certain distance (get away from your bees) (distance set by the host), or they die.
Double click on someone with your kill button to kill them normally.
Kill everyone to win.
Beehive.StungPlayersDieOnMeeting: Stung Players Die on Meeting Start
Beehive.Notify: <#ffff00>You were stung by the Beehive!\nWalk {0} units away from the Beehive in {1}s or you die!</color>
ClockBlockerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Clock Blocker, each kill you perform increases the emergency meeting cooldown time after meetings.
SpurtInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nGdy zaczynasz sie poruszac, otrzymujesz ogromny przyspieszony ruch, ktory szybko zanika. Aby odzyskac predkosc, musisz przez chwile pozostac w bezruchu.
FragileInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Fragile, even if someone uses their kill button on you with a non-killing intent, they'll kill you anyway.
PhysicistInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nGrants portable vitals access for crewmate Roles.
InquisitorInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Inquisitor, you may vote someone in a meeting to see whose role they know.
Inquisitor.KnowExactRolesAfterTasksFinis: Know Exact Roles After Finishing All Tasks
CompelledInfoLong: (Add-Ons):\nYou must vote in every meeting, or you suicide.
PostponerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Postponer, when you kill, no dead body spawns instantly. Instead, it will spawn after a delay (in the same place as the murder).
TreeInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs a Tree, you can pet to act like one (become anonymous and invisible). After a few seconds, you will fall down, killing or stunning everyone nearby, and making you visible again.
ClairvoyantInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Clairvoyant, you can see the remaining impostor and neutral killer counts by entering a vent or petting.
SafeguardInfo: Otrzymujesz tymczasowa tarcze za wykonywanie zadan
SafeguardInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nJako Safeguard otrzymujesz tymczasowa tarcze za kazde ukonczone zadanie
TelekineticInfo: Execute Different Actions to Help the Crew
TelekineticInfoLong: (Crewmates): Sees a timer at all times. Dies if it gets above 60s. They can vent to change modes. They can only have one mode activated at a time. To execute an action, pet. Frozen for 5s after using some powers, timer is 40s after a meeting. Each action increases the timer by a certain amount when used (indicated next to the action name in the following list in brackets) Modes: Teleport Target: teleports the nearest player outside the map (+40s) Teleport Self: teleports themself outside the map (+30s) Freeze: freezes the nearest player (+35s) Kill: instantly kills the nearest player (+60s) Shield: gives them a shield lasting for some time (+45s) Speed: gives them increased speed for some time (+30s) Doors: opens all closed doors instantly (+35s)
NonplusInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Nonplus, you can blind others by venting or petting. Blinded players can't see anything for a set amount of time.\nKill everyone to win.
TaskMasterInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Task Master, you automatically complete 1 task after every meeting.
CentralizerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Centralizer, mark a position. Then use your ability again to teleport a certain number of players to that position. You may also be included.
VacuumInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Vacuum, while using your ability, all kills' bodies will teleport to you.
RookieInfo: You Can't Kill on the First Round
RookieInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYou can't kill on the first round.
TraineeInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYou can't vent, sabotage, shapeshift, or pet on the first round.
TraineeNotify: <#ffff00>As the <#4287f5>Trainee</color>, you can't vent, sabotage, shapeshift, or pet on the first round!</color>
SoothsayerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nJako Soothsayer mozesz przewidziec swojego zabojce, glosujac na niego. Jesli masz racje, po Twojej smierci wszyscy poznaja tozsamosc zabojcy
SoothsayerDiedNotify:
Soothsayer przewidzial, ze {0} go zabije
i mial racje!
VentriloquistInfo: Make Others Say What You Want
VentriloquistInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Ventriloquist, you can make others say what you want. First, type /target {id} to target a player. Then, type /chat {message} to make the targeted player say the message.
AugmenterInfo: Choose Who You Want to Kill
AugmenterInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Augmenter, you can shapeshift into someone to make them your target. The next time you attempt to kill someone, they will be swapped with your target and you will kill your target instead.
AugmenterFail: <#ffff44>Your attempt of murdering your target failed,\nso you've murdered your original target instead.</color>
InquirerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nJako Inquirer, mozesz sprawdzic czy gracz ma konkretna role wpisujac komende /check {id gracza} {rola}. Istnieje szansa na niepowiedzenie i falszywie dodatny badz falszywie ujemny wynik.
Inquirer.MessageTrue: <#00ff00>Poprawnie! Ten gracz ma te role, ktora wpisales.
Inquirer.MessageFalse: <#ff0000>Niepoprawnie! Ten gracz nie ma roli, ktora wpisales.
FreezerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nJako Freezer mozesz uzyc Shapeshift, by zamrozic gracza. Zamrozony gracz nie moze sie ruszac przez okreslony czas.
PredatorInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Predator, you must kill one player that has one of the roles listed below your name. If you succeed to do so, you'll win with the winning team at the end. If you kill someone who doesn't have one of the roles listed below your name, you'll die.
NumOfRolesToKill: Amount of Roles to Choose From
MaxImpRolePicks: Maximum Number of Impostor Roles to Choose From
PredatorDone: You've done your job.\nYou'll win with the winning team at the end.
MarkseekerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nJako Markseeker, Twoj pierwszy oddany glos na danego gracza oznaczy go jako Twoj cel. Kiedy zginiesz, rola oznaczonego gracza zostanie wszystkim ujawniona.
TigerInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Tiger, you can sabotage/pet to become enraged. If you kill while you're enraged, the next closest player (within a radius) to your kill also dies.
RouleteGrandeurInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Roulette Grandeur, you can play Russian Roulette to reduce your kill cooldown after the next kill you make. Vent to cycle between the amount of risk (bullets) you put in. There are 5 slots. If you land on a bullet, you die. If you survive, your kill cooldown is permanately reduced by a set amount multiplied by the risk (bullets) you put in! Sabotage or pet to play a round with the chosen risk factor.
KCDReduction: Kill Cooldown Reduction (multiplied by the amount of bullets put in)
TankInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Tank, you must vent in every vent on the map. If you succeed to do so before the end of the game, you win with the winning team at the end. Otherwise, you lose. Your speed is significantly lower than others'.
GuessTank: According to the host's settings, the Tank cannot be guessed.
Tank.Suffix: <size=80%><#00ffa5>A random vent you haven't entered yet:</color> {0}</size>
RetributionistInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Retributionist, you may mark a player using your kill button to camp them. If they die, you will be notified. In the meeting after that, you may use /retribute {id} to kill the player who killed your target. If you guess wrong, nothing happens. After the meeting, you may camp another player.
Retributionist.ResetCampedPlayerAfterEve: Can Camp a New Player After Every Meeting
Retributionist.TargetDead: <#ffff00>Your target is dead!</color>\nYou can use <u>/retribute {id}</u> to kill the player who killed your target in the next meeting.
Retributionist.KillerDead: <#ffa500>-</color> <#ffab1b>Correct, but the killer is already dead, or they've disconnected.
RG.Hit: <#ffff00>The hit landed on one of your bullets!\nBetter luck next time!</color>
RG.NoHit: <#00ffa5>You survived, despite putting in <#8cffff>{0}</color> bullets.\nYour kill cooldown was reduced by <#8cffff>{1}s</color>!</color>
AgitatorInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Agitator, your premise is essentially Hot Potato.

Use your kill button on a player to pass the bomb.
This can only be done once per round.

The player who receives the bomb will be notified when receiving said bomb, in which they need to pass it to another player by getting near a player.

When a meeting is called, the player with the bomb dies.

If trying to pass to Pestilence or a Veteran on alert, the bombed player dies instead.
Optionally, the Agitator cannot receive the bomb.
AgitatorTargetNotify: <size=110%><#ffff00>YOU HAVE THE BOMB!!</color>\n<#ffa500>Pass it to someone else or die!</color></size>
ExclusionaryInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Exclusionary, single click with your kill button on someone to exclude them (after a short delay). This will hide all players from them in their POV. Double click to kill normally.
CatalystInfo: Give Helpful Add-ons to Your Team With Each Kill
CatalystInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Catalyst, with each kill you make, every impostor-teamed players gains a new helpful add-on. Depending on the settings, they may lose these add-ons after you die.
Catalyst.RemoveGivenAddonsAfterDeath: Remove all given add-ons after the <#ff1919>Catalyst</color> dies
Catalyst.AddonGivenNotify: The <#ff1919>Catalyst</color> gave you a new add-on!
BestowerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Bestower, you can use your kill button to give your target more ability uses.
ConcealerInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Concealer, each body of yours will be camouflaged.
TiredInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs a Tired Impostor, you can only kill a certain number of players each round.
InvestorInfo: Inwestuj w graczy, obstawiajac kto wygra
InvestorInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nMozesz oznaczac graczy przyciskiem kill. Wygrywasz, gdy okreslony procent oznaczonych graczy wygra gre.
Investor.PercentNeed: Minimum Percentage of Winning Marked Players Needed to Win
CleanserRemovedRole: {0} has been cleansed. All their Addons will be removed after the meeting.
LostAddonByCleanser: All your Addons were removed by the {0}
CleanserInfo: Erase All Addons of your vote target
CleanserInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nCleanser can vote for any target at the meeting to erase the target's Add-ons, and the erasure will take effect after the meeting ends. Depending on the settings cleansed player may never get add on in future
CleansedInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nCleansed Add-on can only be obtained if cleanser erases all your Add-ons. Depending on the cleanser settings, you may not be able to obtain any more Add-ons in the future.
UnderdogMaximumPlayersNeededToKill: Maximum players needed for low cooldown
UnderdogKillCooldownWithMorePlayersAlive: Kill Cooldown when more players are alive
UnluckyTaskSuicideChance: Chance to suicide from doing tasks
UnluckyReportSuicideChance: Chance to suicide from reporting bodies
UnluckySabotageSuicideChance: Chance to suicide from opening a door
DiseasedCDReset: Cooldown returns to normal after a meeting
AntidoteCDReset: Cooldown returns to normal after a meeting
DetectiveEHRInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Detective, you can write down notes about each crime scene and interrogate suspects.
ViperEHRInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Viper, the bodies you leave behind slowly dissolve due to your acid, making them disappear and unreportable.
SharpshooterInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Sharpshooter, you may use your ability to go blind and super fast, while also freezing in place for other players. The first player you go near dies, and you teleport back to where you used your ability. If you don't kill anyone within a few seconds, you misfire (suicide).\nKill everyone to win!
ExplosivistInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Explosivist, you cannot kill normally. Instead, you can pet/vanish to develop a bomb and start carrying it. Others will only see the bomb itself, and you standing in place where you've started to use your ability. After a few seconds, the bomb explodes, killing everyone nearby, and you teleport back to where you started carrying the bomb.\nKill everyone to win!
BomberCooldownsResetEachOther: Kill Cooldown & Bomb Cooldown Reset Each Other When Used
MinionInfoLong: (Impostor/Neutral Ghost):\nJako Minion, mozesz ochronic kogos (najlepiej crewmate’a), oslepiajac go na kilka sekund.
WardenInfoLong: (Crewmate Ghost):\nJako Warden mozesz chronic kogos (najlepiej Crewmate'a), aby ostrzec go przed niebezpieczenstwem i dac mu tymczasowe przyspieszenie.
WardenNotify: The Warden warns you that you're in danger!
PhantasmInfo: Daj sie zabic i skoncz taski aby wygrac!
PhantasmInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nJako Specter Twoim celem jest dac sie zabic i wykonac swoje zadania. Mozesz robic zadania bedac zywy, ale nie mozesz wygrac, jesli przezyjesz. Jesli zostaniesz zabity i masz wykonane wszystkie zadania, wygrywasz razem ze zwycieska druzyna.
SnatchWin: Snatches Win (Win With Winning Team if Off)
BloodmoonInfoLong: (Impostor Ghost):\nJako Bloodmoon mozesz uzyc przycisku ochrony na graczu, aby sprawic, ze zginie po okreslonym czasie. Gracz zostaje o tym poinformowany.
BloodmoonNearYou: <#ffff00>The {0} is near you! Stay away to avoid death!</color>
GAInfoLong: (Crewmate Ghost):\nJako Guardian Angel mozesz ochronic gracza, ratujac go przed smiercia. Jest to klasyczna rola Guardian Angela w formie add-ona.
FacilitatorInfoLong: (Coven Ghost):\nAs the Facilitator, you can protect a Coven member to give them the Necronomicon. (Protecting a non-Coven member or one who already has the Necronomicon does nothing.)
ShadeInfoLong: (Neutral Ghost):\nAs the Shade, you must mark everyone to win! You can mark someone by using your protect button on them. If you succeed to mark everyone before the end of the game, you win with the winning team at the end. This is only an additional win condition, it does not override your original win condition.
HaunterInfoLong: (Crewmate/Neutral Ghost):\nJako Haunter, gdy ukonczysz wszystkie zadania, imie losowego zyjacego impostora zostanie pokazane na czerwono wszystkim podczas spotkan. Gdy zostanie Ci 1 zadanie, wszyscy impostorzy dostana strzalke prowadzaca do Ciebie – jesli ktorys z nich sie zblizy, tracisz te role.
Haunter1TaskLeft: <#ffff00>Haunter prawie ukonczyl swoje zadania!\nZbliz sie do niego, inaczej Twoja rola moze zostac ujawniona!!</color>
HaunterFinishedTasks: Haunter skonczyl wszystkie zadania, impostor zostal ujawniony! (ale nie Ty)
HaunterStoppedSelf: <#ff1313>Impostor zblizyl sie za bardzo – straciles swoja role.</color>
Haunter.TasksBeforeBeingKnown: Reveal Haunter When They've Completed This Many Tasks
Haunter.NumberOfReveals: Number of Players Revealed on Task Completion
RememberedFollower: You remembered you were a Follower!
RememberedAmnesiac: Nie udalo Ci sie zapamietac swojej roli.
ReportBodyAfterRemember: Po zapamietaniu roli poprzez przycisk reportowania, reportuj ciala.
HasArrowsToDeadBodies: Sees Arrows to Dead Bodies (If Remembering by Reporting)
IncompatibleNeutralMode: If neutral is incompatible, turn into
ImmuneToAttacksWhenTasksDone: Immune to attacks on task completion
UnboundInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Unbound, when someone tries to guess you, even if they guessed you as an incorrect role or add-on, it will be successful anyway.
ListenerInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs the Listener, you have a chance to hear others' whispers. You may hear the full message, or only get to know who whispered to who.
CaptainInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Captain, you always see who is in the same room as you. Additionally, your vote target will be tracked, and you'll get a list of rooms they've entered (in order) in the next round in the next meeting.
Captain.TargetInfo: {0} entered the following rooms this round, in this order:\n{1}
Captain.Suffix: <size=80%>Players in the same room as you:\n{0}</size>
AmbusherInfo: Ambush Players to Make Them Fragile
AmbusherInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Ambusher, use your ability to become invisible. Follow someone for a few seconds to ambush them. If you succeed, the player gets Fragile effects. Otherwise, you become visible once your invisibility duration runs out and nothing happens.
Ambusher.FollowDuration: Time Needed to Follow Someone For
Ambusher.InvisDurAfterSuccessfulAmbush: Extra Invisibility Duration After Successful Ambushes
PsychopathInfo: You're Forced to Kill Off Cooldown
PsychopathInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Psychopath, as soon as your kill cooldown is up, you'll kill instantly if someone is inside your kill-range.
DoubleAgentInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Double Agent, you are an impostor among impostors. The real impostors see you as their partner, but you don't know who they are. Trick them into thinking you're one of their partners to expose them!
AbyssbringerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nJako Abyssbringer mozesz stawiac czarne dziury. Czarne dziury wciagaja graczy i zabijaja ich przy zderzeniu.
Abyssbringer.Suffix: <size=80%><#00ffa5>Number of players consumed by</color> {0} <#00ffa5>active black holes:</color></size><size=70%>\n{1}
BlackHoleMovesTowardsNearestPlayer: Black Hole Moves Towards Nearest Player
SleepInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nPodczas sabotazu swiatel zasypiasz. Nic nie widzisz i nie mozesz sie ruszac. Budzisz sie dopiero, gdy swiatla zostana naprawione. Jesli podejdzie do Ciebie gracz z dodatkiem Glow, obudzisz sie calkowicie i utracisz ten dodatek.
ClerkInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Clerk, you may vote for someone in a meeting to check their taxes. If they've completed a task in the last round (or finished them all, or they have none), they get a tax refund (speed & vision boost for the next round). Otherwise, they die.

You win if crewmates lose. Or if the game ends due to a task win (everyone did their taxes)!
Clerk.CanUseAbilityOnFirstMeeting: Can Use Ability on First Meeting
Clerk.DidTax: {0} did their taxes. They got a refund!
Clerk.Killed: {0} was caught not doing their taxes (tasks). They were killed!
DecryptorInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Decryptor, each X tasks you complete (X is set by the host), you get to know one more letter from everyone's roles. You can see these characters below players' names. The letters are not in order and each letter only appears once for every occurance in the role name. Settings determine whether you can guess.
Decryptor.TaskNum: Number of Tasks to Complete for Each Letter
InspectorCheckTargetKnow: Targets know they were checked by <color=#0D57AF>Inspector</color>
InspectorCheckOtherTargetKnow: Targets know who they were checked with
InspectorDead: You can not use your power after death
InspectorCheckMax: Max inspections per game reached!\nYou can not use your power anymore.
InspectorCheckRound: Max inspections per round reached!\nYou can check again in the next round.
InspectorCheckSelf: HA!! you thought it would be this easy. You can not check yourself
InspectorCheckSame: Bruh, did you seriously just compare a player to themselves?
InspectorCheckReveal: HA! you thought it would be this easy. You can not check a role that is revealed
InspectorCheckTrue: {0} and {1} are in the same team!"
InspectorCheckFalse: {0} and {1} are NOT in the same team!
InspectorCheckHelp:
Instructions: /cp [Player ID 1] [Player ID 2] 
Example: /cp 1 5 
You can see the player IDs before everyone's names 
 or use the /id command to list the player IDs
InspectorCheckNull: Please select an ID of a living player to check their team
InspectorCheckBaitCountMode: <color=#00f7ff>Bait</color> count as revealing role if <color=#00f7ff>Bait</color> reveal on first meeting is on
InspectorCheckRevealTarget: When tasks done, target knows team of other target
InspectorCopTargetReveal: Looks like {0} is aligned with team {1}
CopyCatResetToCopyCatEachRound: Resetuj role do <#ffb2ab>Copycata</color> po kazdym spotkaniu
CopyCatAlreadyCopy: Juz skopiowales role w tej rundzie
CopyCatCanNotCopy: Nie mozesz skopiowac tej roli gracza
CopyCrewVarEvenIfDisabled: Can copy the crew variant even if that role is disabled
CopyCrewVar: Can copy evil variants of crew roles
CouncillorDead: you can't murder from the dead."
CouncillorMurderMax: Sorry, you've reached the maximum amount of murders.
LaughToWhoMurderSelf: Hahaha, who would've thought someone was stupid enough to murder themselves?\n\nGuess it happens to be... YOU!
MisguessButNoSuicide: You guessed incorrectly so you.... WOULD have died if the host wasn't kind enough to disable guesser suicides!
MurderHelp: Command: /tl [player ID]\nYou can see the players' IDs before the players' names.\nOr use /id to view the list of all player IDs.
MurderNull: Please choose a living player to murder.
CouncillorMurderMaxMeeting: You cannot murder more players in this meeting. You've reached the limit set by the host.
DazzlerDazzleLimit: Maksymalna liczba graczy objeta zmniejszona wizja
DazzlerResetDazzledVisionOnDeath: Przywroc widzenie oslepionym graczom po smierci/wyrzuceniu
SpiderInfo: Trap players in your webs then eat them
SpiderInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Spider, vanish/pet/shapeshift to place a web. If someone walks into it, they'll be frozen and have lower vision, and you'll get a notification about someone being trapped in your web. If someone is in your web for too long, the web breaks and they get freed. You can only kill the players that are trapped in a web!\nKill everyone to win!
Spider.TrappedDuration: Trapped Duration (after which the web breaks)
GardenerInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Gardener, pet to place a plant. After the next meeting, it will be grown. No one can directly kill near grown plants. However, once a plant has blocked a kill attempt, it despawns.
Gardener.PlantAlreadyExistsNearby: <#ff0000>Can't place a new plant here, one is already nearby!</color>
Gardener.PlantCreated: <#00ff00>Plant created!</color>\nIt will be visible after the next meeting.
PawnInfo: Zrob wszystkie taski, a potem wybierz sobie role!
PawnInfoLong: (Neutrals): Zrob wszystkie taski, a potem uzyj komendy /choose {rola} aby wybrac swoja role. Mozesz wybrac tylko jedna z wlaczonych rol. Przegrywasz jesli na koncu gry nadal bedziesz Pawnem.
BlindInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYou cannot see any arrows towards dead bodies and players.
ForgerInfoLong: (Impostors):\nAs the Forger, you can use /forge {id} {role} to change the specified player's role to the one you specifed after they die. Note that this will only be visual, the player will keep their actual role technically.
DealerInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Dealer, use your kill button to give players random add-ons. If you give a certain amount of add-ons, your win condition satisfy, and you'll win with the winning team at the end.
Dealer.AddonAppears: Add-ons Assign Target Sees the Add-on
Dealer.AssignNeedToWin: Number of Add-ons Needed to Give to Win
BatteryInfoLong:
(Crewmates):\nako Battery, jesli masz przynajmniej 1 uzycie zdolnosci, sabotaz swiatel zostanie natychmiast naprawiony, gdy tylko zostanie wywolany.<size=50%>
Pomysl: Raredeer</size>
BatteryNotify: <#ffa500>The lights sabotage cannot be called\nbecause there's a {0} alive</color>
PresidentInfoLong: (Crewmates): As the President, you have 6 decrees each to be used once in the game. You can only use 1 decree in every meeting. To use a decree, type /decree {number}, replacing {number} with the ID of the corresponding decree. To get a list of decrees and their IDs, type /decree. List of decrees and what they do: - Revealing: Reveals you as the President for everyone, makes you unguessable and cuts your vision in half for the rest of the game. - Finishing: Ends the current meeting instantly without counting the votes. - Declassification: Everyone will see voting colors at the end of the current meeting. - Government Support: Gives all crewmates +1 ability use. - Investigation: Get info about how many impostors and neutral killers are alive. - Government Recruiting: After using, vote for someone to recruit them (your vote will be canceled and you'll be able to vote normally after this) to recruit that player to the role specified in the settings, if they're a crewmate.
President.Help: Command: /decree {decree ID}\nYou can see the decree IDs by typing /decree
President.Recruit.TargetNotifyMessage: You have been recruited by the <#30916f>President</color>!
President.DecreeAlreadyUsedMessage: You have already used this decree or it isn't enabled!
President.DecreeAlreadyChosenThisMeeting: You have already chosen a decree this meeting!
GuessErased: You cannot guess a player's role that has been erased.
VenererInfoLong:
(Impostors):
As the Venerer, each kill you make gives you a new ability on top of all existing ones (up to 3) that you can use by shapeshifting/vanishing/petting. All abilites will activate at the same time and for the same duration. Abilities gained:
1st Kill: Camouflage (turn grey)
2nd Kill: Dash (become faster)
3rd Kill: Freeze (slow down everyone near you)
AlchemistInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Alchemist, you create a potion by completing a task. The potion you made will show up under your role name with its corresponding description and instructions. You can get 7 different potions.
AlchemistVisionOnLightsOut: Vision During Lights Out During Sight Potion
AlchemistGotQFPotion: <color=#ffffff><size=1.7><color=#e6d798>Potion Name: </color><color=#3333ff>Quick Fix Potion</color>\n<color=#e6d798>Description: </color>You can fix the next critical sabotage alone\nActivates <color=#e6d798>automatically</color></size></color>
AlchemistGotTPPotion: <color=#ffffff><size=1.7><color=#e6d798>Potion Name: </color><color=#42d1ff>Teleport Potion</color>\n<color=#e6d798>Description: </color>Teleports you to a random player\nActivate by <color=#e6d798>Venting/Petting</color></size></color>
AlchemistGotSuicidePotion:
<color=#ffffff><size=1.7><color=#ffff00>Awkward Potion</color>
Looks like you've mixed the wrong ingredients!
<color=#ff1919>Drinking this potion will kill you!</color>
Activate by <color=#e6d798>Venting/Petting</color></size></color>
AlchemistNoPotion: You don't have any potions ready to drink
QuickFixPotionWaitForUse: Quick Fix Potion, wait for use
AddictFreezeTimeAfterInvulnerbility: Time the <color=#008000>Addict</color> gets frozen in place after <color=#008000>Invulnerbility</color>
DeathpactShowArrowsToOtherPlayersInPact: Show arrows leading to other players in <color=#ff1919>Death Pact</color>
DeathpactReduceVisionWhileInPact: Reduce vision for players in <color=#ff1919>Death Pact</color>
DeathpactKillPlayersInDeathpactOnMeeting: Kill players in <color=#ff1919>Death Pact</color> on meeting
DeathpactCouldNotAddTarget: Target can't be added to Death Pact.
DevourerHideNameConsumed: Hide the names of consumed players
EatenByDevourer: Your skin was eaten by the Devourer
OracleCheckSelfMsg: You can't even trust yourself, huh?
OracleCheck.Coven: Appears to be a Coven member
BerserkerInfo: Go Berserk If Others Kill More Than You
BerserkerInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Berserker, you get stronger each time someone other than you kills:
<size=80%>1: Long kill range
2: Lower kill cooldown
3: Impostor vision
4: Immunity
5: Suicide</size>
If you kill, your strength goes down a level. Kill everyone to win!
DadInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the dad, your life depends on alcohol. When you get attacked or voted out, you survive, but your alcohol decreases. Alcohol also decreases slowly over time. To increase your alcohol level, you have to get money from completing tasks and go to a random selected vent to buy a beer. Beer increases your alcohol level. When you finish all your tasks, you get new tasks, but you don't have to do them for task win. You don't know how much alcohol you have at the time. You only see warning when your alcohol level is low. Alcohol is counted in ‰.

You also have some abilities that are unlocked if you have enough alcohol. To use ability, switch between them using pet button and use selected one by venting:
<size=60%>- Going for milk: You go for milk. When you use it, you get teleported outside the map. You also can't discuss or vote in meetings. You can do nothing. You will come back with milk after exactly 10 years. When you come back, crewmates instantly win. When you use it, everyone will be informed about it.
- Super vision: You will have max vision for some time.
- Sniffing: You get arrows pointing to existing dead bodies after using it. Arrows only update when you sniff again.
- Sleep: During sleep people can't interact with you, but you can't see or move. During sleep you also cannot use any abilities and your alcohol is stable. You wake up when a meeting starts.
- Rage: You kill next person you see.
- Giving drink: You give all nearby players a drink. Every of these players will say their role in meeting with a chance of an incorrect result.
- Becoming god of alcohol: Resets your alcohol to 1‰, but your alcohol will increase instead of decreasing from now on.</size>
<size=70%>Every ability (except going for milk) will reduce your alcohol after using it.
If your alcohol reaches 0‰, you die.
Also, you see which abilities you can use. It can give you some more information about your alcohol level.
To make this role balanced, when someone attacks you, you lose alcohol after some time and not instantly.</size>
Dad.AlcoholDecreaseOnVotedOut: Alcohol decrease when getting voted out
Dad.ShowWarningWhenAlcoholIsBelow: Show warning when alcohol level is below
Dad.MoneyGainOnTaskComplete: Money gain with each task completed
Dad.GoForMilk.AlcoholDecrease: Alcohol decrease after Going For Milk
Dad.SuperVision.AlcoholDecrease: Alcohol decrease after using Super Vision
Dad.BecomeGodOfAlcohol.AlcoholDecrease: Alcohol decrease after Becoming God Of Alcohol
Dad.GoForMilk.AlcoholRequirement: Required alcohol level to Go For Milk
Dad.SuperVision.AlcoholRequirement: Required alcohol level to use Super Vision
Dad.GiveDrink.AlcoholRequirement: Required alcohol level to Give Drink
Dad.BecomeGodOfAlcohol.AlcoholRequiremen: Required alcohol level to Become God Of Alcohol
Dad.AbilityNotAvailable: Ability not available (alcohol level too low)
Dad.GoForMilkNotify: The Dad went for milk\nThey will be back in 10 years
Dad.ShopSuffix: <size=80%><color=#00ffa5>Vent to buy</color> {0} <color=#00ffa5>alcohol from the money you have</color></size>
Dad.GoForMilk.Description: You get teleported outside the map; can't discuss or vote in meetings\nYou'll come back with milk after 10 years. When you do, crewmates instantly win.\nWhen you use it, everyone will be informed about it.
Dad.SuperVision.Description: You will have max vision for some time
Dad.Sniffing.Description: You get arrows pointing to existing dead bodies; arrows only update when you sniff again
Dad.Sleep.Description: While sleeping, you can't see, move or use any abilities\nbut also can't be interacted with and your alcohol level is stable
Dad.Rage.Description: You kill next person you see
Dad.GiveDrink.Description: You give all nearby players a drink. Every of these players will\nsay their role in the next meeting with a chance of inaccuracy.
Dad.BecomeGodOfAlcohol.Description: Resets your alcohol to 1‰; alcohol will increase instead of decreasing from now on.
ToiletMasterInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nMozesz stawiac toalety na mapie, ktore daja losowe efekty w zaleznosci od kupki uzytkownika.
TM.ToiletVisibility: Toilet Visibility Mode For Other Players After Placing
TM.PurplePoopNotifyOnKillAttempt: Purple Poop Notify On Kill Attempt
TM.GreenPoopKiller: There is a killer near you
TM.GreenPoop: There is no killer near you
DualityInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Duality, you always see a timer. You must kill within the time limit. If you fail, you suicide. If you succeed, the timer resets and you then need to complete a task in time. Failing kills you, succeeding resets the timer and you go back to the killing phase. The cycle repeats until the game ends. Kill everyone to win!
Duality.Time: Time to do a task or kill
FarmerInfo: Plant Seeds & Sell Them For Buffs
FarmerInfoLong:
(Crewmates):
As the Farmer, each task you complete gives you a new seed. You can plant it anywhere by petting. After the next meeting, every planted seed will be grown. Pet near one to harvest and sell it. Each seed gives you or the crew different buffs.<size=75%>

- Wheat: Increased vision for all crewmates
- Carrot: Shield for all crewmates
- Apple: Invisibility (for you)
- Tomato: Speed boost (for you)
- Potato: Reset all killers' cooldowns
- Blueberry: Arrow to all dead bodies (for you)</size>
Farmer.CompleteTaskToGetSeed: <size=80%><{0}>Complete a task to get a seed</color></size>
AstralInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Astral, you can vent/pet to become a ghost for a short time. After that, you will be revived.
HelperInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nako Helper, za kazdym razem gdy ukonczysz zadanie, losowy crewmate bedzie mial jedno ze swoich zadan zaliczone.
HelperCompletedTaskForYou: The {0} completed a task for you!
ThiefInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Thief, you must kill someone to become their role:
<size=80%>- Impostor / Neutral Killing roles => become the same role as them
- Trickster => become Double Agent
- Maverick => become Serial Killer
- Madmate roles => become Renegade
- Coven roles (if enabled) => become Coven Member</size>
If you kill any other role, you suicide.
Thief.CanKillRound1: Can Kill on the First Round
SensorInfo: Whenever Someone Sabotages, You See an Arrow Towards Them
SensorInfoLong: (Crewmates):\nAs the Sensor, whenever someone sabotages, you get a temporary arrow pointing at them.
LooterInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nAs a Looter, when you report a body, you take all of the target's add-ons.
SoulCollectorInfoLong: (Neutrals):\nAs the Soul Collector, when you kill someone, everyone other than you and your target will see the target as a living player. Your targets fully die when a meeting gets called.\nKill everyone to win!
ChameleonInvisInCooldown: Zdolnosc wciaz na cooldownie, przebranie nieudane
CannotCleanWhenKCDIsntUp: Cannot Clean Bodies When Kill Cooldown Isn't Up
CannotStoneGazeWhenKCDIsntUp: Cannot Stone Gaze Bodies When Kill Cooldown Isn't Up
SpiritualistNoticeMessage: Spiritualist ma strzalke wskazujaca na Ciebie!\nMozesz wskazac na zabojce albo wrobic crewmate'a
VultureMaxEatenInOneRound: Maximum eaten bodies possible per round
VultureChangeRoleWhenCantWin: Change role when winning is impossible
SuccessfulDuelsToWin: Number of successful duels needed to win
GuessPestilence: You just tried to guess Pestilence!\n\nSorry, Pestilence killed you.
DoomsayerMaxNumberOfGuessesPerMeeting: Max number of guesses per meeting
DoomsayerMisguessRolePrevGuessRoleUntilN: Misguessing role prevents guessing roles until next meeting
DoomsayerCantGuess: Sorry, you can only guess the roles in the next meeting.
DoomsayerCorrectlyGuessRole: You guessed the role correctly!\nBut the player didn't die because the Host settings don't allow them to die
DoomsayerNotCorrectlyGuessRole: You didn't correctly guess the role!\nBut you didn't die because the Host's settings don't allow you to die
DoomsayerGuessSameRoleAgainMsg: You tried to guess the same role or add-on that you guessed before
YouReceivedTheNecronomicon: You have received the <{0}>Necronomicon</color>! This grants you the ability to kill normally, and other abilities based on your role.
PlayerReceivedTheNecronomicon: {0} has received the <{1}>Necronomicon!\nNow, {2} Coven members have the Necronomicon: {3}
CovenMemberInfoLong: (Coven):\nYour previous Coven role was lost. You are now a regular Coven member. You still win with the Coven, but you don't have any abilities, cannot kill, and cannot get the Necronomicon.\nIf the Coven Leader dies, you become the new Coven Leader.
CovenLeaderInfoLong: (Coven):\nYou will always spawn if the Coven is enabled. You are the only Coven member who can directly kill. You gain the Necronomicon first. When your powers are enhanced by the Necronomicon, your kill cooldown is halved, and you gain a long kill distance.
SpellCasterInfoLong: (Coven):\nConjure hexes on players; when all players are hexed, the Coven wins after the next meeting if any Spellcasters are still alive (other players will know about this; you appear as hexed if more than half of the alive players are hexed). Upon gaining the Necronomicon, you will spell (like the Witch) all targets that are or become hexed.
SpellCaster.WinConditionMet: The Coven will win after this meeting if the {0} is still alive.
SpellCaster.WinConditionMetTitle: <#ffff00>⚠</color> The {0} has hexed all non-Coven players! <#ffff00>⚠</color>
PotionMasterInfo: Use potions to support the Coven
PotionMasterInfoLong: (Coven):\nUse potions on players to support the Coven. Using a potion on a Coven member gives them a medic shield. Using a potion on a non-Coven member reveals their role to all Coven members. Upon gaining the Necronomicon, instead of revealing roles, you kill non-Coven members.
PoacheInfo: Poison kills with delay or disables votes
PoacheInfoLong: (Coven):\nPoison a player, making them unable to vote in the next meeting. Players will not know they've been poisoned. Upon gaining the Necronomicon, poisoned players will die a few seconds (determined by the host's settings) after poisoning them.
ReaperInfoLong: (Coven):\nCurse a player; when a cursed player dies, you gain a soul. Upon reaching a specific number of souls (set by the host) (or if you're the last killer alive), you become Death. You cannot have the Necronomicon enhance your powers.
Reaper.SoulsRequired: Number of Souls required to transform into Death
DeathInfoLong: (Coven):\nYou cannot be killed normally and you have a low kill cooldown, similar to Pestilence. You cannot have the Necronomicon enhance your powers.
VoodooMasterInfoLong: (Coven):\nForce someone to use their ability on themselves or generally (like Tornado or Camouflager). Upon gaining the Necronomicon, you will also kill the target.
GoddessInfoLong: (Coven):\nUse a stone gaze (vanish button), causing anyone who interacts with you to die, much like a Veteran. Unlike a Veteran, all bodies will be stoned and cannot be reported. Upon gaining the Necronomicon, you can kill players directly, and they will still be stoned.
AugurInfoLong: (Coven):\nYou can guess players' roles during meetings. You cannot gain the Necronomicon, similar to a Reaper.
Augur.MaxGuessesPerMeeting: Max number of guesses per meeting
Augur.MaxGuessesPerGame: Max number of guesses per game
DreamweaverInfoLong: (Coven):\nWeave a player; woven players will become insane after the next meeting. Once insane, when they go near someone, they will immediately use their ability if their cooldown is up. Upon your death, all insane players will be freed. When enhanced by the Necronomicon, insane players will suicide after making contact with another player.
InsaneInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nInsane players were woven by the Dreamweaver. You are forced to use your ability on any player you touch as soon as your cooldown is up. If the Dreamweaver dies, you lose this add-on.
BansheeInfoLong: (Coven):\nScreech nearby players to deafen them (using the vanish button), making them unable to hear or see the chat during the next meeting. With the Necronomicon, your screech becomes lethal.
IllusionistInfoLong: (Coven):\nSample a player, then select another player (using Shapeshift) to morph them into the sampled player. Upon gaining the Necronomicon, you gain the ability to kill the sampled player (by double clicking with your kill button on them).
Illusionist.UnmorphPrevious: Unmorph previous target if a new one is chosen
TimelordInfoLong: (Coven):\nUse your ability on a Coven member to refresh their cooldown (set it to 0). Use your ability on a non-Coven member to reset their cooldown. When enhanced by the Necronomicon, you can kill and also reduce meeting time upon making a kill.
EnchanterInfoLong: (Coven):\nEnchant a player, making them appear as a Coven member to crew investigators. When an enchanted player is killed, their death reason will be random. When enhanced by the Necronomicon, you gain the ability to kill (by double clicking with your kill button on someone).
SirenInfoLong:
(Coven):
The Siren has an entrancing voice. Use the Sing ability (via the Vanish button) to affect nearby players.
- On the first hearing, non-Coven players are blinded and slowed for a short time.
- On the second, they are again blinded and slowed, and cannot report bodies temporarily.
- On the third, they become Entranced, converting to the Coven.

With the Necronomicon, the Siren gains the ability to kill normally, and her Sing is boosted by two stages:
- Players who've heard no songs are treated as if they've heard two.
- Players who've heard one song are treated as if they've heard three and become Entranced.
The Siren sees a tracker near each player's name showing their current stage (0/3, 1/3, 2/3, Entranced).
EntrancedInfoLong: (Add-ons):\nYou are a non-Coven player who has been entranced by the Siren. You are now on the Coven team and win with them at the end.
WyrdInfo: Mark players; doom triggers on action.
WyrdInfoLong:
(Coven):
The Wyrd manipulates destiny by marking players with Fate’s Countdown. Marked players share a hidden countdown that begins when the first player is marked. Once the countdown expires, any marked player who tries to complete a task, report a body, or press the meeting button will instantly die.

The Wyrd can only mark a certain number of players at a time. To mark someone, shapeshift into them.
When 2 or more players are marked, they can see the countdown.

With the Necronomicon, the Wyrd can kill directly using the kill button.

Notes:
All marked players share the same countdown.
A small bonus to the countdown is added for each additional marked player.
The countdown pauses during meetings.
Wyrd.BlockMeetingOnDeath: Block Meeting If The Marked Player Died due to the above settings
Wyrd.Suffix.SuicideWarnings: <#ffff00><size=80%>⚠ The following actions will cause you to suicide: ⚠\n{0}</size></color>
MoonDancerInfoLong:
(Coven):
As the Moon Dancer, you can vanish to assign yourself a random add-on. You can also use your kill button on someone,
- once to give them an add-on, that is: helpful if they're a coven member, otherwise harmful (assigned after the next meeting)
- twice to steal all add-ons from them<sup>*</sup>

With the Necronomicon, double clicks kill the target, while also stealing all add-ons from them<sup>*</sup>.

<sup>*</sup>If settings allow
MoonDancer.OthersAssignAddonCooldown: Cooldown for Assigning Add-ons to Others

To set your own role like with /up, you need to do '/setrole 0 (ROLE)'.
